inodeSecond Union Reference

Different interpretations for the variable context of the inode depending on the inode status (in use/free): type 2 context. More...

#include <sofs_inode.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t mtime
 if the inode is in use, time of last file modification
uint32_t prev
 if the inode is free, reference to the previous inode in the double-linked list of free inodes

Detailed Description

Different interpretations for the variable context of the inode depending on the inode status (in use/free): type 2 context.

It may either contain:

  • the time of modification file access when the inode is in use
  • the reference to the previous inode when the inode is free.
The documentation for this union was generated from the following file:
  • sofs_inode.h
